remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusButtonEventHandler> and then invokes it. For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](../Topic/Routed%20Events%20Overview.md).

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusButton"> that raises this event.
